title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.16 - Public protection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.16 - Public protection

State Regulations

An amusement device shall not be used or operated while
any person is so located as to be endangered by it. Areas in which persons may
be so endangered shall be fenced, barricaded or otherwise guarded against
public intrusion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-2.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
